name: Countless Sights to See
title: Kirara: Countless Sights to See
inPlayDescription: When your <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Kirara who has this card equipped is the active character, spend 1 less Elemental Die when switching characters. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Kirara to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Kirara, equip this card.After Kirara equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Meow-teor Kick once.When your <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Kirara who has this card equipped is the active character, spend 1 less Elemental Die when switching characters. (Once per Round)(You must have Kirara in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
